title: Excellent All-in-One Platform to manage Events, Memberships, CRM, Email Marketing and Finance
name: Brecht T.
pros: Pros: As an active Chamber of Commerce, we were looking for something that would enable us (and improve) to manage our events, members, email campaigns, CRM, collect payments and be user-friendly at the same time. We wanted to replace several out-dated technologies and instead use one software for our internal operations.
cons: Cons: EventBank's all-in-one platform has few shortcomings that I can think about and it has meet our expectations. We are looking forward to the new products features that are being released in the (near) future.

title: I got through my first event and realized I needed a different platform once completed
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It was easy to set up the registration page and ticket options. Somewhat customizable. Check in was standard. Reporting is descent, can download excel spreadsheets for specific ticket types.
cons: Cons: 1. The top con on my list would be the payout process. Being that my events function based on ticket sales it's important that I have access to funds more frequently then twice per month. Other ticketing systems will pay you out every few days. I ran in to an issue where I needed to pay my instructors, venue and other staff but didn't have the funds available, so I had to front the money out of my own pocket.
overall: Overall: My overall experience was much better than my previous with using other softwares my only gripe was what i mentioned above. If those 4 issues can be fixed then I'd say it's a great platform but for now I'm going to be finding another option.

title: Modern Cloud Software for Membership Driven Organizations
name: Edward O.
pros: Pros: Many great features under one umbrella. From CRM, Event Management, Social Engagement, Email Marketing Campaigns, Invoicing, Membership Management & Financing, this software enables you run your business effectively and efficiently. Additionally, Eventbank designs and maintains our primary website which provides members and users with a high end look and feel.
cons: Cons: My dislikes are minor (i.e. more member to member engagement features)
overall: Overall: My overall experience has been extremely pleasing and time saving. Time is of the essence and we need to work fast in today's business environment, Eventbank allows me to save time and get things done much quicker due to the fact that many features of running a day-to-day business are built into one portal.

title: Eventbank were our ticketing partner for the 2018 St Patrick's Day Irish Ball
name: Martina H.
pros: Pros: The software was easy to use, provided up to date information, allowed for the creation of reports with detailed information and the Customer Support provided by Eventbank was great, all queries were dealt with in a timely and professional manner.
cons: Cons: The only con was the inability to create tickets for a full table as a back end user. This is an event specific con as creation of individual tickets is a very easy process
overall: Overall: The software made the sale and management of tickets and financial reporting incredibly easy and straightforward.

title: Putting the service in 'Platform as a Service'
name: James S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It's functions are very apt to fulfill many needs of our organization, and the team responsiveness is great.
cons: Cons: There are minor issues with some of the registration functions.
overall: Overall: I've been working on implementing EventBank as the primary platform to organize, manage, and execute group exercise events for FitFam Shanghai - we're a very active and consistent fitness community and volunteer organization based in shanghai that organizes and runs completely free outdoor and some indoor workouts. The volume of workout 'events' that we do per week has increased drastically, and with EventBank we've been able to go from a rag-tag group of volunteers to a much more organized and efficient planning group. As a grassroots movement, this kind of tool is amazing and essential for us to be able to keep doing what we love, but do it better and better.

title: Very effective platform, with more to come
name: Graham N.
pros: Pros: The look and feel, and the potential to manipulate the data.
cons: Cons: It has been a struggle to iron out the complications in the CRM, but it gets better all the time.
overall: Overall: EventBank has some excellent features that make the chamber's work much easier. Their background is with events, and their platform provides a lot of features to help make the set-up, promotion and registration easier for us and the participants. For me, the e-newsletter system stands out - it used to take us weeks to put together a new email newsletter, but now we can do it in an afternoon. It also helps us collect a lot of data about the effectiveness of campaigns.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: It offers a lot of functionality, and they add a lot of functionality, so you'll need to keep playing with it to understand all that it can do.

title: Good vision, good care of customers, good product
name: Aisling M.
pros: Pros: UX, Ease of use
cons: Cons: No HTML functions
overall: Overall: I have been using EventBank for over 1 year. I appreciate that they listen to customers and release updates in line with suggestions they have received. Their support team has an incredibly fast response time, and always has a great answer or solution to my problem.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: If you really can't figure out how to accomplish what you want with this product, ask the support team. They're really helpful.

title: A happy upgrade - an even better improvement
name: Williams N.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: One of the most refreshing elements of Eventbank is its interface. A large step up from our previous CRM and Event Management systems, Eventbank has a user-friendly interface that is easy to use and navigate - either through exploring by yourself or through the help of their tutorial videos. Furthermore, in the CRM module, individual contacts and companies are seperated for easy access, and the Member companies are contained in another module of the CRM.
cons: Cons: Some of the features unfortunately we have been unable to use due to legal requirements in our jurisdiction - including to our chagrin, the invoicing feature. While it is near impossible to find software that is going to meet exactly every need of every organisation without creating a custom-made solution, Eventbank is open to suggestions and their team have been very supportive and happy to take on board any suggestions or needs that we have had.

title: All in One Event management system for our community
name: Vy V.
pros: Pros: We use the platform for 35+ events a week across 2 cities and at present we manage over 4000+ members. In the last year we created over 1000+ workouts/ meetings/ social gatherings for FitFam, we would not be able to manage our community effectively without this platform. We are able to easily set up events for our community to access and register for, regardless of indoor or outdoor sessions and numbers allowed.Easy administration for efficient review, publishing, check in process. EventBank works seamlessly along side our other information platforms, giving us more visibility.
cons: Cons: We created a 'how - to - use' PDF for our community to easily use the platform as we had users downloading the managers app instead of the users app.

title: Good all-in-one platform for social organization
name: Laurine B.
pros: Pros: She Loves Tech is a global platform committed to empower women in tech. We were looking for asoftware that would help use manage our events, CRM and mail marketing. Thanks to our partnership with Event Bank, we benefit from an easy to use all-in-one platform. The events module and the mail marketing are very straightforward which enabled us to be more efficient in our work. That's something that matters a lot for us! As a small team, we couldn't afford to waste time working with out-dated technologies and Event Bank provided what we needed.
cons: Cons: We encountered minor bugs while using the registration and mail marketing functions.

title: Productive now that we have Eventbank
name: Matthieu B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: With Eventbank, I can onboard new organisers smoothly and delegate them exactly the rights I want. It's simple to create personalised and professional designs for our event pages. Sharing on social media and their payment methods are all smooth and straightforward.
cons: Cons: They could provide more analytics, drive some traffic from their own audience and offer more features to design their event pages.
overall: Overall: We have tried many "popular" services in China to sell tickets to our events and it is clear that they don't know their industry. Eventbank clearly made the effort to think from an organiser's perspective rather than click bait standpoint (or least effort required).
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Go for it, absolutely worth switching from the existing players in the market

title: EventBank as a great software for event management
name: Andrea R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Very intuitive to use. Offers many automatic functions like ticket sale, payment and confirmation, as well as email reminders to participants. Offers diverse design templates and functionalities that can be customised. Great customer service. Served us not only for organising the event but also for promoting the event through detailed event descriptions, speaker bios, sponsor page. Offers an app for both event managers as well as participants. Very easy to track and manage ticket sales and registration lists.
cons: Cons: We used EventBank with an umbrella page for a complex series of 11 events in 8 days and 8 different venues. The complexity tested the limits of the software in terms of flexibility and customization. Not possible to show more than one venue. Also, not possible to link iCalendar to specific event but only to entire 8 days nor to disable this function. However, this degree of complexity is certainly an exception for events managed by EventBank software.
overall: Overall: We didn't use it as Membership Management Software

title: Easy-to-use event management tool with great support
name: Paige J.
pros: Pros: We use EventBank's event management software for all of our large events at Kempinski. It is very intuitive and easy-to-use, and we can create great looking professional event websites with registration, payments, community features, and other information we need to display. QR Code Check-ins with the Manager App are super-fast. Great thing is also that we have a dedicated Customer Success Manager and she helps us with all the questions and queries in a timely manner.
cons: Cons: Our event pages are bi-lingual - both English and Chinese, and sometimes the Chinese version of the website is not super intuitive.
overall: Overall: Efficiency, happy attendees, professional look.

title: Eventbank- great for Membership organizations
name: Steven P.
pros: Pros: It is the best one I have seen for chambers, combining membership and event tracking
cons: Cons: It is new so some of the stuff is not 100% fully worked out yet; but they are updating all the time and it gets better every week
overall: Overall: A reasonably new but with great ideas and a really responsive support team. What I have really liked is that fact that if the system does not already have what you need they are very good at developing new features going forward. For me it is the best I have seen for chamber use
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: If you are a chamber of commerce or a membership and event based organization this is a great choice

title: Great tool for Chambers of Commerce
name: Anna R.
pros: Pros: It is an all-in-one software: Events Management, Membership Management, Database recording
cons: Cons: Automatic messaging should be more customizable.
overall: Overall: Our Chamber has been using Eventbank for almost 2 years now and we are able to provide a much more professional service to our Members and to keep better track of new leads and our guests. We are overall very satisfied with the service.

title: Data-based. Functional. Fast. Ads easy to be published. First choice for setting RSVP of events.
name: Evander W.
pros: Pros: I mainly use EventBank to set up events registration whenever my organization organises any external/sometimes internal events. So, my comments in this survey are all based on my experience on this feature, I know there are many other features including CRM etc though.
cons: Cons: Sometimes, I get confused about the two EventBank websites -.com and .cn because they both have English home pages while my administrator account is only valid in one website. So, upon logging in a new device on which where the right website is not saved as a bookmark, I have to try both sites to log in successfully.
overall: Overall: Easy to use. I have got the connection with prospective members and thus i can better build cooperation with them.

title: User friendly platform.
name: S A Kumari D.
pros: Pros: Members can edit there details directly instead of sending it to us, online registration is also being done. Membership has increased.
cons: Cons: Our finance department wants a specific tax invoice, which is not available in the platform. It would be good if that is looked into.

title: Robust, reliable and user friendly.
name: Mohanraj S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Campaign and Event management features are absolutely easy to use with ready templates.Dashboard & filter features are also useful for real time analysis.
cons: Cons: The support provided is limited.No training document /video provided.Users have to contact the support manager for answers on "how to ".The payment gateway for Credit Card payment is hefty

title: As a chamber of commerce, EventBank really helps us moving forward, especially with its application.
name: Papatsorn K.
pros: Pros: Easy to use. It links CRM with event managment, membership and broadcast platform, making members tracking become easier and lessen double tasks in the past when the mentioned 3 platform are seperate softwares.
cons: Cons: There are too many notifications sending out when adjustment/update has been made. We prefer to disturb our members as little as possible.

title: We are happy with the improvement the team has made to facilitate our organisation needs
name: Icu M.
pros: Pros: We so far really appreciate Its feature for easy registration flow. Thus, we can manage better our event
cons: Cons: Interface of membership. It would be better if the platform could facilitate easier way to preview the corporate members too.
overall: Overall: Having a smart data and easier facility to manage the event registration and campaign

title: A complete End to end events and membership management platform
name: Mohan R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: - Ease of Use- Slick UX- Responsive design- Native app- Everything in one place for managing an association viz. Memberships, events, finance, mailing list.- You dont have to have the headache of managing several platforms viz. mailchimp, a CRM and an ERP module with disjoined data which makes no sense.
cons: Cons: SInce we haven't seen anything as compelling and all encompassing as this, I'am finding it a little hard to list the cons.
overall: Overall: What is most important for all enterprise software to succeed is the team and hand holding. By far, that remains the most crucial success factor for any large scale deployment of the best of the best ERP or CRM or any software tool for that matter and that remains the key attribute of Event bank. The passionate team members coupled with flawless execution of onboarding a client and hand holding them end to end.

title: Empower Your Events with Eventbank
name: Rachel C.
pros: Pros: Easy-to-use Templates, Online Payment, Management Android/IOS Apps, Email Campaigns.
cons: Cons: Level of Customization.
overall: Overall: As an organizer of numerous events every year, we have used the Eventbank for more than a year and really like it. It is a true breakthrough app which greatly improves the efficiency of the whole team. By providing many ready-to-use templates, the software allows us to plan and promote our events online over in a short time. It also offers all important information attendees need weeks and months ahead of the events, such as schedules, maps, contact persons, speakers bios, and more. Meanwhile, the mobile Eventbank Manager is often used as a supplement to the online event management platforms. It makes it possible for every team members to keep updated the event progress and manage the event anytime and anywhere. It is definitely worthy to have a try!

title: Organizing our events is much faster
name: Elisa S.
pros: Pros: It's very easy to create events and we can do it all just using EventBank- we don't need other solutions as email marketing and Crm are all included. While it used to take us few days to create events pages, send out emails and collect registrations, it only takes few minutes now. We can also duplicate our regular events easily.
cons: Cons: French language and support in French language would be nice to have, but so far we managed. Other than that no cons.

title: The event is large or very small? with EventBank it does not matter.
name: Cristina Marcano L.
pros: Pros: It makes it very quick and easy to sell tickets for an event, as well as the creation and consultation of the financial reports that are generated from those sales. It is versatile, because it can be used in a large community of people, as well as in a small community and even in different events simultaneously. It's great.
cons: Cons: I am studying it with my students and I still have not found any aspect that can be said is not suitable.
overall: Overall: I study it with my students as a tool of knowledge in the subject Management and Organization of Events of the Hospitality Career of my university.

title: Membership-based CRM with a lot of customization options
name: andrea v.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It has a lot of different features that you can customize according to the need of your organization so that it can fit different purposes (event management, membership management, CRM, email marketing)
cons: Cons: Some minor things, but those are always improved with the help of Customer Success Team

title: Great event software
name: Shawna Z.
pros: Pros: Easy to access attendee, speaker, sponsor, and other details thanks to integrated CRM. Registrations and their tracking are customizable and working seamlessly too.
cons: Cons: Just some small details - like the map of the location of the event sometimes wasn't displaying properly.
overall: Overall: Nice event software. I had very good experience of using Eventbank for about a year now. It helps to manage the events and registrations easily. The staff is also great - whenever you had a question, they just happily offered to help. Great team!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Try it out!

title: Perfectly fits China market. All-in-one solution for CRM, email marketing and event management.
name: Marian D.
pros: Pros: Event management, CRM, email marketing, engagement solution, event website builder, mobile check-in, most popular online payments, integration with WeChat.
cons: Cons: So far so good. Overall experience is great. Some event website and email marketing templates can be improved.

title: Using EventBank Resource
name: Pamela G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It's really easy to use makes you feel like an expert.
cons: Cons: I have not had any issues with the resource to like anything least about it.
overall: Overall: The membership management software allow makes it easy to track a members payments, activities, contact details and market to a member.

title: Helping us to build our new community!
name: Stewart P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: We recently launched our organization and didn't have a dedicated website, resources, or team in place as the launch event was quickly approaching. EventBank was able to help us in all of these areas with their all-in-one platform.
cons: Cons: Yet to encounter anything negative from the platform

title: Eventbank is the best all-in-one solution! EB has amazing features like CRM, Event Management, etc.
name: Madeleine M.
pros: Pros: 1. It is very easy to use2. The feature to send out campaigns is awesome3. Language options in Mandarin, English and Spanish4. Available on Mobile Phone (Apps)5. Checking In Attendees during events are super convenient, scanning QR codes, search by names, etc.
cons: Cons: Sometimes the detailed information of the checking in status isn't synchronize. So it creates confusion on how many people have actually checked-in or not.

title: Easy to use
name: Kimberly B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: User-friendly. The sections like workflow manager are well organized. You can easily sort out things using Eventbank.
cons: Cons: Just the frequent update of the software but nothing big.

title: EventBank helps us run our events more efficiently.
name: Tanya K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: EventBank event management platform allowed us to be more efficient in distributing information about our events, approving attendees and streamlining the check-in process during the event. The CRM function is a convenient way to manage our email database and structure communication campaigns.
cons: Cons: We are satisfied with the EventBank features we utilize at the moment - there are no specific "cons" that come to mind so far.

title: It helps the way we engage with our guests and saves us more time with check-in
name: Olivia M.
pros: Pros: -great team behind customer service-good support from the finance team-one of the best event management apps out there- time efficient when it comes to transferring payment to our bank account-makes check-in easier
cons: Cons: Some guests had problems when they tried to purchase their tickets. Some had trouble finding the ticket or with registering their full info.

title: A great event management app, CRM, membership-based management, etc.
name: Camden H.
pros: Pros: -One of the best all-in-one solution-Amazing features (CRM, membership management)-Super easy check-in process
cons: Cons: -There is one thing EventBank could improve on; marketing campaign. Our guests sometimes receive the email in their spam folders and we would have to ask them to check their email often. But looking forward to new updates in the future.

title: EventBank is super helpful for our event. We would like to work with EventBank again in the future.
name: Carol C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The process is smooth and easy to follow. Convinence for customers from everywhere. Check in process also easy.
cons: Cons: There are some points may improve, 1. which coupons customers used, if we can track more details 2. some times people dont receive confirmation emails (not big deals) maybe its their email server problem 3. the wechat payment method didnt direct to wechat, just a qr code bit confuse

title: Indispensable in China
name: Carol R.
comments: Comments: Yale Center Beijing hosted hundreds of events and managed tens and thousands of contacts using this platform. Better than Eventbrite for China because of its China-friendly functionalities. Nice interface and easy to use.

title: This is truly an app for Chambers of Commerce
name: Karri K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The creators seem to know what is essential for a Chamber of Commerce. Posting events for example is very easy with the given templates and directions. Just the ease of use makes me happy. Simply an excellent tool for any chamber.
overall: Overall: working tool

title: Great Platform easy to use especially for bilingual use
name: Margaret K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: UI is good; adapted to different markets (e.g. included WeChat, the most important social/mobile platform in China); easy to use
cons: Cons: Nothing. It's all good so far :)
overall: Overall: Been using Eventbank's platform for event organization in China. It's been a great experience. The user interface is easy to navigate and they also made bilingual (EN/CN) very easy to manage. The China team has been very supportive in the whole process. Payment was also very smooth. QR code check-in was swift (especially everyone is used to QR code in China). We still need to learn to fully utilize the CRM functions. Would recommend it!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Nothing at the moment. Good software needs to be smooth and easy to use. Eventbank is good that way.

title: Easy to set up, excellent customer service. Highly recommended for events/CRM strategy and more.
name: Petros D.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Incredibly easy to use, both for our admin who created the event online but also for our staff at the check-in desk on the day of the event. Seamless and customizable excel sheets for attendees information makes CRM simple and enjoyable. Excellent user support and customer service- EventBank team members supported throughout the process of setting up the event, polite and helpful. Can't wait to use it again!
cons: Cons: Nothing negative to say! This was our free trial, looking forward to using the software again in future events.

title: Good all-in-one platform for event professionals
name: Stuart F.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I found that it's really easy to design and build a custom event webpage. It's intuitive to use and requires very little training to get up and running. The email marketing functionality also makes it really easy to market and promote upcoming events, especially if you need a last minute push. It's also easy to add sub pages such as sponsors, partners and maps etc.
cons: Cons: I don't have many complaints about this platform but I would like to see more features designed to help encourage and increase event attendee engagement.

title: I need an app last minute to check people into our event.
name: Ricky A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Super easy to use and easy to track everyone who RSVP'ed and attended. This program also looked really professional and had a few options to make my job easier.
cons: Cons: Couldn't find any issues!

title: Great product that has made event management easier.
name: Jaclyn S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy-to-use, great customer support, streamlined services. Using Eventbank has saved me so much time registering users and checking them in at events. It's also allowed me to easily gather data and compare attendees across events.
cons: Cons: Accessibility for visually-impaired users is lacking (but is in the works), and it sometimes glitches on when the app is used on the iPad.

title: Functions running very well. Great customer service.
name: Alex Z.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Great customer service. Very quick reply. Technicians help me with every step before the event start.
cons: Cons: Would be better if can send SMS message.
